column4: hello people, I just installed ubuntu on two old servers, both 700mhz pIII with 256meg ram and one of them is running horribly slow, and I can't figure out why. It doesn't seem to be processing anything while it lags but it takes up to five minutes to open any given program.
open a terminal, and type top
it'll open up something similar to the task manager in windows, only much more responsive
